reviewText: My son really likes Thomas the Train. His favorite episode is Thomas, Percy, and the Dragon. So when he saw this movie he flipped his lid! I like that it has two movies in one, twice the bang for my buck. And the quality was great! A solid buy for any Thomas lover.

Our son liked this one. The "treasure" is what got his attention. He's very much into pirates and treasures lately. But in all honesty, he doesn't ask to watch it that much. Seems he likes the one with Trusty friends more Thomas & Friends: Thomas' Trusty Friends. He watches that one for inspiration to play with his Thomas sets. And more recently the one he watches more often is the one with Hero Thomas & Friends: Hero of the Rails. He likes the characters and he likes the racing between Thomas and Spencer.

I placed an order for this movie from Media Thrill LLC, 109 Ambersweet Way, Davenport, FL 33897-8418.  They shipped the wrong movie after we had waited nearly 3 weeks for it to arrive.  When I contacted them to get the order corrected, they said I could return the unopened movie for a refund.  Have you ever presented a child with a package from the mail?  Did you have any luck telling them they could NOT have the movie after they already opened the package?  Well, MediaThrill then changed their mind and so graciously told me I would be allowed to return it still, although it was "unfortunate I opened an item that was not what I ordered".  They then said what I had ordered was "no longer available to them" so they could not correct the order.  So it still "wasn't their fault".
What a joke.  They obviously can't handle their business, so don't order from them.
As a result, I can't actually review this movie, as I have not seen it, even though I ordered and paid for it.
